title: Philips New Hue 2.0 Hub Lets Siri Control Your Home Lightning
text:
Philips New Hue 2.0 Hub Lets Siri Control Your Home Lightning 
Published By: Gizmodo.com - Today 
Today, Philips announced the newest incarnation of its smart light system, Hue. While the hub may have changed from a circle to a more round...
